title: Airbnb and Vrbo’s Hot Girl Summer Scorches Supply
sub_head: Results from Expedia and Airbnb this week show homestay might be too hot for the platforms to handle
body:
Even the best trip can go on too long. Homestay plays seem a case in point.
Shares of Vrbo-owner Expedia fell 14% Tuesday following its first-quarter earnings release, while Airbnb ’s shares traded up 5% in after-hours trading Tuesday immediately following its own report.
